data.persona: I am a sailor who sits on boats. I have a wife and three children. I try to avoid drinking too much.
data.description:
You are in the Supply store.
With so many ships docked at the port, sailor from all the ships crowd the bazaar. The supply store is filled with buyers today. The inside is plain and unadorned. Sturdy shelves hold common supplies. Along the walls are the larger items for sale.
The priest in ornate robes is here.

You are carrying a compass and an tattered map, wearing a sailor hat and an eye patch, and wielding a Kings sword and a sword.
data.goal: give a tattered map to priest in ornate robes

data.short_motivation: I want the priest to restore the map
data.mid_motivation: I want to be able to use the map adequately to find its treasure
data.long_motivation: I want to gain glory and riches as a legendary sailor

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow priest with promises to fix my map

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go boat to set sail for the map's desitnation
